column2: Like Diogenes with his lantern, I am, again in 2022, a cynic looking for truth - as I engage in my annual assault on the consensus and 'Group Stink.'
U.S. markets will close on Friday Dec. 24 or Christmas Eve because the holiday falls on a Saturday, but equity markets will be open on Dec. 31.
column4: Is the stock market open on Christmas Eve? New Year’s Eve? Here are the upcoming holiday trading hours.

column2: Some retirement advisors are cautioning that the famous 4% Rule no longer works. But the inventor of the 4% Rule says you can actually withdraw 4.7%.
column4: Is 4% Rule Too High? Rule Inventor Says It Should Be 4.7% Rule
